hero.description: Accessible websites and connected digital tools for nature entrepreneurs, artists, therapists, and positive change makers.

philosophy.label: Philosophy
philosophy.title: Digital at the service of
philosophy.description: A professional website shouldn't cost months of fundraising. Your mission deserves a showcase worthy of it.

accessible.title: Accessible
accessible.description: Solidarity pricing so that digital no longer hinders your growth.

human.title: Human
human.description: Personalized support, attentive to your needs and your universe.

efficient.title: Efficient
efficient.description: High-performance websites, delivered quickly, so you can focus on what matters.

philosophy.quote: Focus on your art, your mission, your passion. I'll take care of your digital showcase.

ecoPerformance.label: Commitment
ecoPerformance.title: An eco-friendly website without sacrificing performance
ecoPerformance.description: Combining eco-design and technical excellence? Absolutely possible! Every website I create respects the environment while offering an optimal user experience.

ecoIndex.title: Eco-design
ecoIndex.subtitle: Reduced environmental impact
ecoIndex.label: Eco-designed site
ecoIndex.description: Every line of code counts. My sites minimize their carbon footprint through optimized images, lightweight code, and hosting powered 100% by renewable energy.

pageSpeed.title: Performance
pageSpeed.subtitle: Speed and fluidity
pageSpeed.label: Maximum score
pageSpeed.description: A fast website improves user experience and SEO. My sites achieve the best Google PageSpeed scores through advanced technical optimizations.

ecoPerformance.footer: Tested and validated by EcoIndex.fr and Google PageSpeed Insights

services.label: Services
services.title: Committed
services.description: Packages designed to adapt to your needs and budget

essential.name: Essential Presence
essential.description: The essentials to exist online with elegance

community.name: Engagement Pack
community.description: To animate and unite your community

creator.name: Creator Pack
creator.description: To sell your creations and services

ecosystem.label: Digital tools
ecosystem.title: Beyond the website:
ecosystem.description: Interconnected tools to simplify your daily life and free you from repetitive tasks.

intro.text: A beautiful website is just the beginning. But managing emails, social media, newsletters, appointments... it can quickly become time-consuming. I set up a suite of open source tools, interconnected and automated, so you can focus on your core business.
intro.highlight: You're an artist, therapist, producer — not a community manager.

ecosystem.toolsTitle: The tools I configure for you

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: List management, automatic sending, custom design.

calendar.title: Appointment booking
calendar.description: Online calendar, automatic reminders, agenda sync.

automation.title: Automations
automation.description: Custom workflows to connect all your tools.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: Automated emails, pre-configured responses, client follow-up.

benefits.title: No dependency
benefits.description: Your data belongs to you. You can migrate at any time.

benefits.title: No hidden fees
benefits.description: No monthly subscriptions piling up. Transparent pricing.

benefits.title: Privacy respect
benefits.description: GDPR-compliant tools that respect your visitors.

benefits.title: Full customization
benefits.description: Each tool adapts to your way of working, not the other way around.

ecosystem.ctaDescription: Rather than a rigid pricing grid, I offer you a complimentary 30-minute audit to understand your needs and provide a custom quote tailored to your situation.
ecosystem.finalCtaNote: 30 min to understand your needs — no commitment

process.label: Process
process.title: How it
process.description: Simple and transparent support, from idea to launch

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: Free conversation to understand your project, needs, and universe.

proposal.title: Proposal
proposal.description: Detailed quote with mockup of your future site and production schedule.

creation.title: Creation
creation.description: Development of your site with regular checkpoints to validate together.

launch.title: Launch
launch.description: Go live, usage training, and support to get you started.

benoit-segui.title: Benoît Segui
benoit-segui.description: Portfolio for a contemporary guitarist and musicology researcher. Minimalist design with personalized visual identity and custom vectors.

bastien-pouilles.title: Bastien Pouilles
bastien-pouilles.description: Portfolio for a contemporary accordionist. Personalized graphic work, photo editing, and minimalist layout.

pikasilla.title: Pikasilla Puhkemaja
pikasilla.description: Holiday and training house in South Estonia. An authentic place for workshops, conferences, and events.

silus.title: Silus Community
silus.description: Community platform with custom systems. Advanced web development in partnership with a professional designer.

orion-naval.title: Orion Naval Engineering
orion-naval.description: Complete website redesign for this naval engineering company established for 13 years. Modern design, security, and local SEO.

better-organix.title: Better Organix
better-organix.description: WordPress redesign keeping the original design with targeted improvements. Clean and team-maintainable site.

joelahtme-aed.title: Jõelähtme Aed
joelahtme-aed.description: Showcase website for a local market garden near Tallinn, Estonia. Highlighting local products and the philosophy of the place.

safariland.title: Safariland
safariland.description: Website for an indoor playground for children in Torcy, France. Playful design and practical information.

hote-ideal.title: L'Hôte Idéal
hote-ideal.description: Showcase website for a second-hand shop. Highlighting products and eco-responsible approach.

vahtrame.title: Vahtrame
vahtrame.description: Website for a carpenter and wooden house builder in Estonia. Presentation of achievements and expertise.

e-compost.title: E-Compost
e-compost.description: Website for an organic waste collection service. Presentation of services and composting awareness.

fairgrow.title: Fairgrow
fairgrow.description: Educational platform on agroecology. Training and resources for sustainable and regenerative agriculture.

fairgreen.title: Fairgreen
fairgreen.description: Showcase website for an organic market garden. Direct sale of seasonal vegetables and short circuit philosophy.

helenes-delicacies.title: Hélène's Delicacies
helenes-delicacies.description: E-commerce for a plant-based cheese artisan in Tallinn. Online shop with ordering, product presentation, and catering services.

cours-vivantes.title: Cours Vivantes
cours-vivantes.description: Burgundy association of 8 professionals dedicated to re-enchanting play spaces. School yard greening, collective intelligence facilitation.
